name: Highway Drag
description:
HIGHWAY DRAG is a free-to-play offline Cross-Platform Car Racing Game available on Android, Windows, MacOS and iOS.

we are also working on WebGL and Linux version!

The Game is Open-Source Unity Project that means you easily download the project file and make your own variant.

>> Change Textures, Design custom maps, more beautiful UI and Models etc.

Device Requirements

>> It can be played on a crappy device too.

Play on Browser (Mobile)

Highway Drag WebGL by Gyann Dev (itch.io)

SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/GyannTechnologies/Highway-Drag_game.git

Contacts:

https://gyann.co.in/instagram

https://gyann.co.in/youtube

info.gyanprabhat@pm.me

***********************************************************************

***After some testing we found that there are some critical issues with the android version so you may not download it. + We aren't going to fix this. As it is a open source project you'll can contribute to this and make changes.***
